import React, {useState, useRef, useEffect} from 'react'; import './HomePage.css'; import { FaUserTag, FaImage, FaUserFriends, FaLock} from "react-icons/fa"; import {MdTagFaces, MdPublic} from "react-icons/md"; import {Select, Switch, Button, Tooltip} from 'antd'; import EditorInput from './CreatePost.jsx'; function HomePage(props){ const {Option} = Select; const [isLoadingSubmit, setIsLoadingSubmit] = useState(false); // func show modal create post function showModalCreatePostFunc(){ props.showModalCreatePostFunc() } // func create post when submit function submitCreatePost(){ setIsLoadingSubmit(true) } return(
showModalCreatePostFunc()} style={props.showModalCreatePost ? {zIndex: '10'} : null}>
Gắn thẻ
{props.showModalCreatePost ?
Tin của bạn

{isLoadingSubmit ? : <> {valueEditor ? : } }
: null}
right
) } export default HomePage;
